variables.description:
The version of Terraria that will be used.

You can use either the full version number or the file number. (eg 1.3.5.3 or 1353)

Get version numbers here - https://terraria.gamepedia.com/Server#Downloads

variables.name: World name
variables.description: The name for the world file.

variables.name: World Size
variables.description: Defines the size of the world. 3 sizes 1 (small), 2 (medium), 3 (large).

variables.name: Maximum players
variables.description: The maximum number of players a server will hold.

variables.name: Language
variables.description:
Defines the language of the server from its language code.
English = en-US, German = de-DE, Italian = it-IT, French = fr-FR, Spanish = es -ES, Russian = ru-RU, Chinese = zh-Hans, Portuguese = pt-BR, Polish = pl-PL

variables.name: Optimize
variables.description: Minimizes liquids moving at the same time. If enabled, it can reduce delays, but liquids may take longer to settle.

variables.name: Security
variables.description: Adds additional fraud protection to the server. (may lead to unfair bans)

variables.name: NPCStream
variables.description: Reduces enemy bounce but increases bandwidth usage. The lower the number, the fewer hops will occur, but more data will be sent. 0 is off.
